sentences.en: Anything anybody said to him to try and buck him up wouldn't sink in.
sentences.cn: 任何人对他说的任何劝他振作起来的话都不会起作用。

sentences.en: Buck never allowed himself to be bullied into doing anything that went against his principles.
sentences.cn: 巴克从来不会因为受到威胁而做违背自己原则的事情。

sentences.en: Buck up your ideas or you'll get more of the same treatment.
sentences.cn: 打起精神来，否则你会吃更多苦头。

sentences.en: He is a buck private.
sentences.cn: 他是一名列兵.

sentences.en: He owes me ten bucks.
sentences.cn: 他欠我十美元。

sentences.en: He was a rebel who bucked the system (=  opposed rules or authority  ) .
sentences.cn: 他是一个反抗体制的叛逆者。

sentences.en: He'd been a real hell-raiser as a young buck.
sentences.cn: 他年轻时是个十足的捣蛋鬼。

sentences.en: His boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.

sentences.en: Hurry [ Buck ] up or we will miss the train.
sentences.cn: 快点,不然我们就赶不上火车了.

sentences.en: If you don't buck up, we'll be late.
sentences.cn: 如果你不快些, 我们就会迟到了.

sentences.en: My friends tried to buck me up after I lost the contest.
sentences.cn: 我在竞赛中失败后，我的朋友们想使我打起精神来

sentences.en: People are saying if we don't buck up we'll be in trouble.
sentences.cn: 人们说，如果我们再不积极行动起来，我们就会有麻烦。

sentences.en: That would probably cost you about fifty bucks.
sentences.cn: 那可能会花费你大约五十美元。

sentences.en: The aim, it seemed, was to buck up their spirits in the face of the recession.
sentences.cn: 其目的好像是为了给面临经济衰退的他们鼓劲儿打气。

sentences.en: The boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.

sentences.en: The buck stops with him. He is ultimately responsible for every aspect of the broadcast.
sentences.cn: 责任在于他。他是该广播节目各方面的总负责人。

sentences.en: The owners don't want to overlook any opportunity to make a buck.
sentences.cn: 老板们不想错过任何可以赚钱的机会。

sentences.en: The plane bucked sharply.
sentences.cn: 飞机剧烈颠簸。

sentences.en: The stallion bucked as he fought against the reins holding him tightly in.
sentences.cn: 那匹种马四蹄离地狂跳，试图挣脱紧紧拴住它的缰绳。

sentences.en: they are itinerant traders out to make a fast buck.
sentences.cn: 他们是流动商人，一心想赚快钱。

sentences.en: They were just in it to make a quick buck.
sentences.cn: 他们做这事就是为了迅速赚大钱。

sentences.en: Unemployment in the area has bucked the trend by falling over the last month.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的失业现象已经有所逆转，最近一个月来失业率下降了。

sentences.en: We stayed at Tom's place. It isn't exactly Buck House, but it's comfortable enough.
sentences.cn: 我们待在汤姆那里。那并不是巴克宫，但足够舒适了。

sentences.en: Why can't you spend a few bucks on a coat?
sentences.cn: 为什么你不能花几美元买件外套呢？

words.tran_cn: （美）钱，元；雄鹿；纨绔子弟；年轻的印第安人或黑人

phrases.tran_cn: 振奋：鼓起勇气或打起精神；使…欢欣鼓舞
变得更认真，更有活力，更努力
n. 轻易得来的钱；投机赚钱

phrases.phrase: the buck stops here (或 with someone)

trans.tran_cn: 美元，澳元，雄性动物，小伙子
trans.tran_en: a US, Canadian, or Australian dollar

trans.tran_cn: （马等）猛地弓背跃起，抵制，反抗
trans.tran_en: to oppose something in a direct way
if a horse bucks, it kicks its back feet into the air, or jumps with all four feet off the ground
